content: stripes and solids no wrong side no seam the sixes and threes cowl is a free pattern and three-part video tutorial you can see the video here on my website https //verypink com/2014/12/17/sixes-and-threes-cowl/ the yarn i used when i designed this has been discontinued you can use three 50 gram hanks of any fingering weight yarn a good substitution is knit picks stroll fingering
